data.persona: I am not a member of royalty. I do not live in a castle. I dislike the royal family.
data.description:
You are in the Temple courtyard.
There are lots of ornate statues everywhere.  It is pretty busy because everyone comes here to pray. There are colorful pieces of cloth tied randomly everywhere.  There is also a huge statue in the middle that everyone is gathered around to pray.
There's a statue, a table, a book, a cloth, a huge statue, and an ornate statue here.
The priest is here.

You are carrying a bible, wearing a shirt, and wielding a stick.

data.short_motivation: I want to take the book
data.mid_motivation: I plan to start reading the book today
data.long_motivation: I intend to discuss the book with the priest in a few weeks
